description:
* Based on a manga by http://anidb.net/cr10856 [Arima Keitarou], published in Comic Gum by Wani Books.
http://anidb.net/ch21409 [Morioka Kouhei] wanted to become a photographer, but all pictures he took were of ghosts. While visiting an old castle in Germany he met a vampire girl, http://anidb.net/ch10077 [Hazuki].
Hazuki was confined in the castle. She tried to suck Kouhei`s blood to make him her slave, but somehow it didn`t work. However, because he happened to break the device to seal her into the castle, Hazuki successfully escaped from the castle and left for Japan to look for her mother.
When she arrived to Japan, she went to Kouhei`s house, in which he was living with his grandfather, and began to live with them forcefully. Because Kouhei had also lost his mother during his childhood, Hazuki reminded him of his childhood and helped her to look for her mother. Then, another vampire girl, http://anidb.net/ch21405 [Elfriede], and http://anidb.net/ch21411 [Count Heinrich von Kinkell] came and began to try to take her back.
Source: AnimeNfo (edited)

REGULAR.description:
Seeking to understand why he couldn’t capture a hauntingly beautiful young girl on film, Kouhei stumbles into a medieval castle and a world he cannot comprehend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onii-sama, Watashi no Shimobe ni Narinasai
おにいさま, 私のシモベになりなさい♡

REGULAR.description:
In order to free Hazuki, Kouhei sets out to destroy the crystal orb - the source of the castle guardian’s power. Meanwhile, Seiji joins the battle from outside the barrier.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 御主人様とお呼びなさい

REGULAR.description:
Kouhei and Hazuki seek out the young vampire’s childhood home, so that she may fulfill her last promise to her mother - the same mother who abandoned her  two years past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onii-sama, Watashi to Issho ni Kurashite Kudasai ne
おにいさま, 私といっしょに暮らしてくださいね

REGULAR.description:
The return of the full moon has stirred Hazuki’s thirst for blood. When Kouhei won’t give her what she wants, the little vamp sets out on the hunt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, I Feel Like Kissing
おにいさま, ...キスしたくなっちゃた

REGULAR.description:
Elfriede, a servant of Count Kinkel, has come to retrieve Hazuki and return her to the castle. The little vampire proves to be less than agreeable, and a fierce and furry battle begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, It`s a Full, Full, Full Moon
おにいさま, ふるふるふるむーん

REGULAR.description:
Kouhei’s family, Hazuki, and Haiji seek mystical assistance at the Mido home in Kyoto. When Elfriede arranges a clandestine rendezvous with Kouhei, Hazuki steps in to set things straight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart Throbs in Kyoto with Big Brother
Onii-sama to Kyoto de... ufu! Wakuwaku!
おにいさまと京都で... うふ♡わくわく♡♡

REGULAR.description:
Finding Kouhei a pitiful excuse for a slave, Hazuki uses her powers to brainwash another unsuspecting soul into following her every command. When Kouhei finds out, a painful fight ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ......だって欲しかったんだもん♡

REGULAR.description:
Hazuki finds herself unprotected after her hopes are painfully manipulated by Count Kinkel. Kouhei and his grandfather must charge into battle to save her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mother Came to See Me! Happy!
母様がきてくれた! うれしい♡

REGULAR.description:
While Gramps and Elfriede join forces and take on Count Kinkel, Kouhei finds Hazuki and wakes her from an enchanted slumber. Unfortunately, the girl who rises to greet him isn’t who he had hoped for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother! Please Save Me from This Dream!
Onii-sama, Watashi o Yume kara Tasukete... Onegai
おにいさま, 私を夢から助けて... あねがい

REGULAR.description:
With Kouhei at death’s door, Hazuki agonizes over her attempt to kill him and is haunted by the relentless voice of her alter-ego, Mistress Luna. Is it truly her fate to lead a cursed life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yurusanai... Hajimete no Shimobe no Kuse ni
ゆるさない... 初めてのシモベのくせに

REGULAR.description:
Concerned for her servant’s health, Hazuki embraces her catty nature and rises to the challenge - Literally! But when Gramp’s condition takes a turn for the worse, this kitty proves to have some fierce claws.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おにいさま, 安静にしてなきゃダメ

REGULAR.description:
Kouhei, Seiji, and Hazuki must set aside their fears and travel to the little vampire’s childhood home. As Kinkel warps reality, each turns against the other, forcing Hazuki to try and drive him away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Forgive Him! Not Him
ゆるせないの, あいつだけは...!

REGULAR.description:
The battered heroes head out into the day to defeat Kinkel. But when a vampire has managed to survive for over 900 years, his death will not be an easy one. Whose bluff will be called in the end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, Let`s All Defeat the Count
Onii-sama, Minna de Hakushaku o Taoshimashou ne
おにいさま, みんなで伯爵を倒しましょうね

REGULAR.description:
Hazuki`s behavior is growing increasingly odd. While Elfriede wonders if she has turned to her alter-ego to escape her guilt, Kouhei realizes how much he misses the other side of Hazuki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Go for a Walk with You, Big Brother
Onii-sama to Issho ni...... Osanpo Shitai Desu
おにいさまといっしょに...... お散歩したいです

REGULAR.description:
With both sides of Hazuki battling for control, Elfriede convinces the young vampire to seek out another servant under the full moon’s light. Kouhei heads out into the night after her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, You Must Take Responsibility
おにいさま, "せきにん"とってくださいね

REGULAR.description:
Hazuki reveals yet another hidden talent: the ability to suppress her presence. In her absolute stillness, Kouhei finds the perfect subject for his photography. Unfortunately, Hazuki’s self-doubt soon creeps in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, I Must Have Cat-ear Buns from Furufuru-do
I Have to Eat Cat-Ear Buns!
Onii-sama, Doushite mo Furufuru Dou no Nekomimi Manjuu Janakucha Dame Nandesu
おにいさま, どうしてもフルフル堂のネコミミ饅頭じゃなくちゃだめなんです

REGULAR.description:
During the quiet hours of the night, Elfriede unburdens her soul to Gramps. Kouhei, feeling powerless to protect Hazuki should another vampire come after them, decides to take his training into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, Why Is This Happening?
Onii-sama, Nande Konna Koto ni Naru Wake!?
おにいさま, なんでこんなことになるわけ!?

REGULAR.description:
Kouhei’s intense training in the mystical arts pays off. When Hazuki is set upon by a demon up on the mountain heights, it’s the servant to the rescue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yahoo! Haihoo! Ima, Ai ni Ikimasu ne
Yahoo! Hi-ho! I`ll See You Soon!
ヤッホー・ハイホー・今, 会いに行きますね

REGULAR.description:
Kaoru, jealous of the bond between Kouhei and Hazuki, seeks to capture her betrothed’s attention by copying the antics of the young vampire. It’s a feline fetish under the full moon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Day on the Mountain: Monkey in the Spa; the Cat`s Whiskers... and Who Are You?
Oyama no Hi: Yukemuri no Saru - Neko no Hige... de, Anta-tachi Dare?
お山の日 湯けむりのサル ねこのヒゲ ...で, あんたたち誰?

REGULAR.description:
Seiji returns bearing grim news of the world outside, but the danger has arrived before the warning. As her servant lies broken at the hands of another, Hazuki flies out into the unknown to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grandfather, Why Are You Dressed Like That?
おじいさま, どーしてそんな格好してるんですか?

REGULAR.description:
Hazuki and Hikaru rush unheeding into the arms of the enemy, and Yayoi and Seiji hurry to their aid. Kouhei is at the mercy of the child vampire, as the defender of the mountain watches from the forest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, Where Is This Nursery Rhyme From?
Onii-sama, Sorette Doko no Chihou no Temari Uta?
おにいさま, それってどこの地方の手まり唄?

REGULAR.description:
Forbidden from killing Luna, Mistress Arte decides to kill the servant instead. Yet the Mido family hides its own share of dark secrets, for the truth behind Kouhei’s lack of psychic prowess is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Didn`t Know You Were Like That
おにいさま, そんなひとだったんですか!?

REGULAR.description:
Kouhei cannot reconcile the little vampire he has grown to love with the monster before his eyes. As the Puppet Master attacks, Hazuki must embrace Kouhei - and Kouhei must embrace his fear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, Am I That Scary?
Onii-sama, Watashitte Sonna ni Hen Desuka?
おにいさま, わたしってそんなにヘンですか?

REGULAR.description:
The castle which had been Hazuki`s cage for so long appears, summoned by her acceptance of her fate. Yayoi, Hikaru, and Haiji follow her in while Gramps and Elfriede struggle to keep the castle from leaving.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good-bye Big Brother... I`m Going Back? I`m Really Going Back?
Sayonara Onii-sama...... Watashi Honto ni Kaecchau yo? Kaecchau yo?
サヨナラ, おにいさま...... 私, ホントに帰っちゃうよ?帰っちゃうよ?

REGULAR.description:
Life for the Mido family returns to normal. Ryuuhei welcomes friends and family to celebrate, but plans go astray as the full moon feast begins. Kouhei might have to save the day one last time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, They Say It`s the End! Will You Always Be My Slave?
Big Brother, They Say This Is the Final Episode! Be My Slave Forever, Will You?
Onii-sama, Saishuukai Da Sou Desu yo. Zutto Watashi no Shimobe de Ite Kudasai ne
おにいさま, 最終会だそうですよ・ずっと私のシモベでいてくださいね

SPECIAL.description:
In this zany spoof, the Mido house has been relocated to the middle of the ocean. While no one but Seiji seems to notice anything wrong with this, the rest go along with their off beat day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother... Up and Down in the Sun, Floating Away. What Is It?
Onii-sama, Yurayura Kirakira Donburako Korette, Naan Da?
おにいさま, ゆらゆらきらきらどんぶらこ これって, なーんだ?
Music CM 1 [Kanashii Yokan][Nami no Toriko ni Naru You ni] Kanashii Yokan ver.
Music CM 2 [Kanashii Yokan][Nami no Toriko ni Naru You ni] Nami no Toriko ni Naru You ni ver.

6232.name: character related tags which need deleting or merging
